parameters.name: Definition
parameters.description: The flow definition. The flow definition must comply with the Flow Definition Language (FDL) syntax. The system supports two types of flow definition standards.

parameters.name: ExecutionMode
parameters.description: The execution mode or the enumeration type. Valid values: Express and Standard. A value of Standard indicates an empty string.

parameters.name: ExternalStorageLocation
parameters.description: The path of the external storage.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the flow. The name is unique within the same region and cannot be modified after the flow is created. Set this parameter based on the following rules:

*   The name can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).
*   The name must start with a letter or an underscore (\_).
*   The name is case-sensitive.
*   The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: RequestId
parameters.description: The request ID. If you specify this parameter, the system uses this value as the ID of the request. If you do not specify this parameter, the system generates a value at random.

parameters.name: RoleArn
parameters.description: The Alibaba Cloud resource name (ARN) of the specified Resource Access Management (RAM) role that Serverless Workflow assumes to invoke resources when the flow is executed.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the flow. Set this parameter to **FDL**.
